title: Angel & Faith: Season Nine #2
description: Following some badmany would say unforgivablechoices as Twilight, Angel needed to hide away and wallow in his guilt. But with a little TLCcourtesy of his only remaining ally, FaithAngel is back to fighting the good fight and taking demons down one by one. With the Watcher's Files at their disposal, Angel comes up with the ultimate plan for redemption. Executive produced by Joss Whedon! Follows the events of Buffy Season 8!
author: Christos Gage
